<tr style="background-color: #DBDBDB">
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.05pt; padding-
left: 0.05pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif"><font style="font-family: Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>Fund flows from operations &ndash; 
Current period</b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.8pt; padding-
left: 0.05pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>&nbsp;126,568 
</b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.8pt; padding-
left: 0.05pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>&nbsp;126,568 
</b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.8pt; padding-
left: 0.05pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>&nbsp;220,235 
</b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Fund flows from operations of $126.6 million
during Q2 2016 represented an increase of 35% versus Q1 2016. This increase 
relates primarily to higher crude oil pricing and global
cost reductions, including a 6% decrease in per unit operating expense.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Fund flows from operations decreased by 2% and
12% for the three and six months ended June 30, 2016, respectively, versus the 
comparable periods in the prior year. This decrease
was the result of lower pricing for all commodities, offset by higher sold 
volumes, including the impact of six months of production
from Corrib. The impact of lower pricing was further minimized by global cost 
reductions, including a 26% and 18% decrease in per
unit operating expense for the three and six months ended June 30, 2016, 
respectively, versus the comparable periods in 2015. Fund
flows from operations for the six month period ended June 30, 2016 was also 
affected by the absence of a $31.8 million court-awarded
recovery recognized in Q1 2015.</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>

    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0pt; font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: 
PageNo -->12<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<DIV STYLE="border: Black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt; 
padding-left: 3pt; width: 99%">
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse">
<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second 
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Fluctuations in fund flows from operations (and
correspondingly net (loss) earnings) may occur as a result of changes in 
commodity prices and costs to produce petroleum and natural
gas. In addition, fund flows from operations may be significantly affected by 
the timing of crude oil shipments in Australia and
France. When crude oil inventory is built up, the related operating expense, 
royalties, and depletion expense are deferred and
carried as inventory on the consolidated balance sheet. When the crude oil 
inventory is subsequently drawn down, the related expenses
are recognized in income.</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>

PageNo -->13<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<DIV STYLE="padding: 0pt 3pt 3pt; border: Black 1pt solid; width: 99%">
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse:

<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color:

    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font

Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>CANADA BUSINESS UNIT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Overview</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production and assets focused in West Pembina
near Drayton Valley, Alberta and Northgate in southeast 
Saskatchewan.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Potential for three significant resource plays
sharing the same surface infrastructure in the West Pembina region in 
Alberta:</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">Cardium light oil (1,800m depth) &ndash; in development 
phase</TD></TR></TABLE>

Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-

    <td style="border-right: black 1pt solid; font-family: Calibri,sans-
serif">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="background-color: #DEDEDE; font-family: Calibri,sans-
serif">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="background-color: #DEDEDE; padding-right: 4.1pt; padding-left: 
0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>&nbsp;48.11 
</b></font></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: 
Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;59.86 </font></td>
    <td style="padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: 
Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">(20%)</font></td></tr>
<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; font-family: Calibri,sans-
serif">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif"><font style="font-family: Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">AECO ($/mmbtu)</font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; background-color: #DEDEDE; 
padding-right: 4.1pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; 
text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size:
10pt"><b>&nbsp;1.40 </b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;1.83 
</font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;2.65 
</font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">(23%)</font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">(47%)</font></td>
    <td style="border-right: black 1pt solid; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; 
font-family: Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; background-color: #DEDEDE; font-
family: Calibri,sans-serif">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; background-color: #DEDEDE; 
padding-right: 4.1pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; 
text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size:
10pt"><b>&nbsp;1.61 </b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;2.70 
</font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 
10pt">(40%)</font></td></tr>
</table></DIV>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0pt; font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name:

    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<DIV STYLE="border: Black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt; 
padding-left: 3pt; width: 99%">
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B></B></P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse">
<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second 
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2 2016 average production in Canada decreased
by 8% quarter-over-quarter, mainly driven by a planned turnaround at our West 
Pembina battery, production declines, and voluntary
gas-weighted production curtailment of approximately 6 mmcf/d (1,000 boe/d) over
the quarter in response to low AECO prices. Q2
2016 production increased 8% year-over-year, primarily attributable to strong 
organic production growth in our Mannville condensate-rich
gas resource play.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Cardium production averaged approximately 6,700
boe/d in Q2 2016, a 10% decrease quarter-over-quarter. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Mannville production averaged approximately
11,500 boe/d in Q2 2016, a 12% decrease quarter-over-quarter but more than 
double Q2 2015 production of approximately 5,600 boe/d.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production from our southeast Saskatchewan 
assets
averaged approximately 2,800 boe/d in Q2 2016, an increase of 5% quarter-over-
quarter.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Activity review</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Vermilion drilled one (1.0 net) operated well
and participated in the drilling of one (0.1 net) non-operated well during Q2 
2016.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify"><I>Cardium</I></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">In Q2 2016, no new operated wells were drilled, completed or 
brought on production. One (0.1 net)
non-operated well was drilled, completed and brought on production during the 
quarter.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">2016 activity includes drilling three (3.0 net) operated wells, 
in addition to the optimization
of existing assets.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify"><I>Mannville</I></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">During Q2 2016, one (0.3 net) non-operated well was completed 
and two (0.8 net) non-operated wells
were brought on production.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">In 2016, we plan to drill or participate in 13 (7.8 net) wells;
six (3.8 net) wells have been drilled
to date.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify"><I>Saskatchewan</I></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">We drilled one (1.0 net) operated Midale well during Q2 2016, 
which we plan to complete and bring
on production in Q1 2017 along with the three operated wells drilled in Q1 2016.
One (0.5 net) non-operated well drilled in Q1
2016 was tied in and brought on production during the quarter.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in">-</TD><TD STYLE="text-
align: justify">We have drilled and participated in seven (5.5 net) wells, 
completing our 2016 planned capital
activity.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Arial,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-
indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Sales</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">The realized price for our crude oil and 
condensate
production in Canada is directly linked to WTI, but is also subject to market 
conditions in western Canada. These market conditions
can result in fluctuations in the pricing differential to WTI, as reflected by 
the Edmonton Sweet index price. The realized price
of our NGLs in Canada is based on product specific differentials pertaining to 
trading hubs in the United States. The realized
price of our natural gas in Canada is based on the AECO spot price in 
Canada.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2 2016 sales per boe increased versus Q1 2016
due to strengthening crude oil pricing.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Sales per boe for the three and six months 
ended
June 30, 2016 decreased versus the comparable periods in 2015, largely as a 
result of lower crude oil and natural gas pricing.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Royalties</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Royalties as a percentage of sales for Q2 2016
decreased to 6.1% as compared to 9.8% in Q1 2016 as a result of an annual 
favourable gas cost allowance adjustment in Alberta resulting
in gas royalties being in a recovery position for the current quarter. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Royalties as a percentage of sales for the 
three
and six months ended June 30, 2016 decreased to 6.1% and 7.9% versus 6.3% and 
8.5% for the comparable 2015 periods due to the impact
of lower reference prices on the sliding scale used to determine crude oil 
royalty rates.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Arial,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; text-
indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Transportation</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Transportation expense relates to the delivery
of crude oil and natural gas production to major pipelines where legal title 
transfers.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Transportation expense for Q2 2016 was lower
than Q1 2016 as a result of lower production. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Transportation expense for the three and six
months ended June 30, 2016 was lower for both periods in absolute dollars while 
production increased. This was primarily the result
of production having an increased natural gas weighting, which has a lower per
unit transportation cost relative to crude oil,
condensate and NGLs. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Operating</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating expense reductions of 23% in Q2 2016
versus Q1 2016, resulting in a 16% reduction in per unit costs for the second 
consecutive quarter. Our cost control and cost-cutting
initiatives, including service cost negotiations impacting numerous cost 
drivers, have resulted in these cost reductions.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating expenses were lower on an absolute
dollar basis for the three and six months ended June 30, 2016 compared to the 
same periods in 2015 by 24% and 7% respectively.
As a result of the cost control and cost-cutting initiatives, these reductions 
were achieved while increasing production, resulting
in year-over-year per unit decreases of 29% and 19%.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
</div>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>

family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: 
PageNo -->15<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom:

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<DIV STYLE="border: Black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt; 
padding-left: 3pt; width: 99%">
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse:

<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>General and administration</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">General and administration
expense fluctuation in Q2 2016 as compared to Q1 2016 was the result of 
expenditure timing.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">Year-over-year, general and
administration expense for the six months ended June 30, 2016 was 29% lower than
the comparable period in 2015 due to cost-cutting
initiatives to reduce our cost structure and preserve balance sheet strength. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
</div>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>FRANCE BUSINESS UNIT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Overview</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Entered France in 1997 and completed three 
subsequent
acquisitions, including two in 2012.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Largest oil producer in France, constituting
approximately three-quarters of domestic oil 
production.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Producing assets include large conventional
oil fields with high working interests located in the Aquitaine and Paris 
Basins, containing an identified inventory of workover,
infill drilling, and secondary recovery opportunities.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production is characterized by Brent-based 
crude
pricing and low base decline rates.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>

Inc.</i></b></font></td>
<TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right;

Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>

justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production increased 1% versus the prior 
quarter.
Year-over-year production decreased 4%, due to the impact of production 
additions from our Champotran drilling program in 2015
and third party restrictions impacting Vic Bilh gas 
production.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Activity review</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">During the quarter we completed a number of
workover and optimization programs in the Aquitaine and Paris 
Basins.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">In
                                         2016, our planned capital activity 
includes a four-well drilling program in Champotran,
                                         and approximately 15 well workovers in 
the Aquitaine and Paris Basins. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Sales </B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Crude
                                         oil in France is priced with reference
to Dated Brent. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2
                                         2016 sales per boe increased versus Q1 
2016 due to strengthening crude oil pricing.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Sales
                                         per boe for the three and six months 
ended June 30, 2016 decreased versus the comparable
                                         periods in 2015 as a result of 
weakening crude oil pricing.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Royalties</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Royalties
                                         in France relate to two components: 
RCDM (levied on units of production and not subject
                                         to changes in commodity prices) and R31
(based on a percentage of sales).</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Royalties
                                         as a percentage of sales was 10.7% and 
12.1% for the three and six months ended June
                                         30, 2016, a decrease from the 14.1% 
realized in Q1 2016 and an increase over the comparable
                                         periods in 2015. These fluctuations in 
royalties as a percentage of sales were the result
                                         of fixed per unit RCDM 
royalties.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Transportation</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family:
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Transportation
                                         expense for the three months ended June
30, 2016 was relatively consistent with Q1 2016
                                         and Q2 2015.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol; font-size: 10pt">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: 
justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 
10pt">Transportation
                                         expense for the six months ended June 
30, 2016 increased by 10% compared to the prior
                                         year due to a 6% increase in volumes 
sold and an 8% depreciation in the Canadian dollar
                                         relative to the Euro. After adjusting 
for the unfavourable foreign exchange impact, per
                                         unit transportation costs decreased by 
4% year-over-year due to successful vessel cost
                                         renegotiations and a lower level of 
project activity at the Amb&egrave;s terminal</FONT>.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Operating</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating
                                         expense decreased by 21% from Q1 2016 
primarily due to decreases in electricity pricing,
                                         electricity consumption and lower 
downhole maintenance costs. In addition, an inventory
                                         build and a favourable foreign exchange
adjustment as the Euro weakened relative to the
                                         Canadian dollar resulted in lower 
costs. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating
                                         expense on a dollar basis decreased 7% 
for the three months ended June 30, 2016 and increased
                                         12% for the six months ended June 30, 
2016 versus the same periods in 2015. An ongoing
                                         focus on cost reduction initiatives and
savings from contract renegotiations helped offset
                                         an unfavourable foreign exchange 
expense in both periods. After normalizing for the unfavourable
                                         foreign exchange impact, per unit costs
have decreased 7% and 2% respectively for the
                                         three and six months ended June 30, 
2016.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>General and administration</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">General and administration expense for the 
three
and six months ended June 30, 2016 decreased by 3% and 6% respectively compared 
to the prior year due to cost reduction initiatives.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman,serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Current income taxes</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">In France, current income 
taxes
are applied to taxable income, after eligible deductions, at a statutory rate of
34.4% for 2016.&nbsp; For 2016, the effective
rate on current taxes is expected to be between approximately 1% to 3% of pre-
tax fund flows from operations. This is subject to
change in response to commodity price fluctuations, the timing of capital 
expenditures, and other eligible in-country adjustments.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">Current income taxes in Q2
2016 were higher compared to Q1 2016 and lower compared to Q2 2015 due to the 
respective change in sales. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">Current income taxes for the
six months ended June 30, 2016 were lower versus the comparative period in 2015 
as a result of decreased sales. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
</div>
<P STYLE="margin: 0">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:

    <td style="border-right: black 1pt solid; font-family: Calibri,sans-

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2 2016 production decreased 8% versus the 
prior
quarter mainly due to downtime associated with the installation of permanent 
wellsite facilities for the Slootdorp-06/07 wells.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-
serif">Year-over-year production increased 50%, primarily due to production 
additions
from Diever-02 and Slootdorp-06/07 wells, and enhanced by debottlenecking at our
Garijp Treatment Centre. The Diever-02 exploration
well (45% working interest), which came on an extended production test in late 
October 2015, continues to produce approximately
15 mmcf/d (2,500 boe/d), net to Vermilion. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-
serif">Production in the Netherlands is actively managed to optimize facility 
use
and regulate declines. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Activity review</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align:

<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Installed permanent wellsite facilities for
the Slootdorp-06/07 wells during Q2 2016.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New

Langezwaag-03
(42% working interest) and Andel-6ST (45% working interest) were carried out 
during the quarter. We expect to drill these wells
in Q3 2016, and if successful, we expect to have the wells on production prior 
to year end.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse:

<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right;

Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Sales</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">The price of our natural gas in the Netherlands
is based on the TTF day-ahead index. GasTerra, a state owned entity, continues 
to purchase all of the natural gas we produce in
the Netherlands. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Sales per boe decreased versus all comparable
periods, consistent with a decrease in the TTF reference price. Compared to the 
comparable periods in 2015, the decrease in price
was entirely offset by increased production.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Royalties</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">In the Netherlands, we pay overriding royalties
on certain wells associated with an acquisition completed by the Netherlands
business unit in October 2013.&nbsp; As such, fluctuations
in royalty expense in the periods presented relate to the amount of production 
from those wells subject to overriding royalties.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.25in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Transportation</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-
serif">Our production in the Netherlands is not subject to transportation 
expense
as gas is sold at the plant gate. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Operating</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating expense on a dollar basis decreased
versus Q1 2016 by 28% due to continued focus on cost-cutting initiatives. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">For the three and six months ended June 30,
2016 operating expense was lower on a dollar and per unit basis compared to the 
same periods in 2015. Our ongoing focus on cost
control, while increasing year-over-year volumes by approximately 50%, resulted 
in per unit cost decreases of 47% and 39% for the
three and six months ended June 30, 2016 versus the comparable periods in 2015. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>General and administration </B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Variances in general and administration expense
generally relate to timing of expenditures, including the timing of allocations 
from Vermilion&rsquo;s Corporate segment. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman,serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Current income taxes</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">In the Netherlands, current
income taxes are applied to taxable income, after eligible deductions, at an 
implied tax rate of approximately 46%. For 2016, the
effective rate on current taxes is expected to be between approximately 15% and 
17% of pre-tax fund flows from operations. This
rate is subject to change in response to commodity price fluctuations, the 
timing of capital expenditures, and other eligible in-country
adjustments. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">Current income taxes in Q2
2016 were higher compared to Q1 2016 as decreased revenues were offset by the 
impact of changes to the 2016 full year tax estimates.
Q2 2016 current income taxes were higher compared to Q2 2015 as result of 
increased pre-tax fund flows from operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">Q2 2016 year-to-date current
income taxes were higher compared to the comparative period in 2015 as a result 
of increased pre-tax fund flows from operations.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
</div>
<P STYLE="margin: 0">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 21; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0pt; font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: 
PageNo -->20<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<DIV STYLE="border: Black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt; 
padding-left: 3pt; width: 99%">
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse">
<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right;
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second 
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>GERMANY BUSINESS UNIT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Overview</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Vermilion entered Germany in February 
2014.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Hold a 25% interest in a four partner 
consortium.
Associated assets include four gas producing fields spanning 11 production 
licenses as well as an exploration license in surrounding
fields. Total license area comprises 204,000 gross acres, of which 85% is in the
exploration license.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Entered into a farm-in agreement in July 2015
that provides Vermilion with participating interest in 18 onshore exploration 
licenses in northwest Germany, comprising approximately
850,000 net undeveloped acres of oil and natural gas rights. Vermilion will 
operate 11 of the 18 licenses during the exploration
phase. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Awarded 110,000 net acres (100% working 
interest)
across two exploration licenses in Lower Saxony in 2016. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>

color: #DEDEDE; padding-right: 4.1pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: 
Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial 
Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>&nbsp;3.81 </b></font></td>
    <td style="vertical-align: top; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-
right: 3.35pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-
align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 
10pt">&nbsp;6.19 </font></td>
    <td style="vertical-align: top; border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-
right: 0.35pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-
align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 
10pt">(38%)</font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2 2016 production decreased 10% quarter-over-
quarter
and 12% year-over-year. Q2 2016 production was impacted by a shut down for 
pipeline pigging operations.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Activity review</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">During Q2 2016, Vermilion entered into a 
definitive
purchase and sale agreement for operated and non-operated interests in five oil 
and three gas producing fields from Engie E&amp;P
Deutschland GmbH, for total consideration of &euro;33 million ($47.9 million). 
Vermilion will assume operatorship of six of the
eight producing fields. For 2016, the assets are expected to produce 
approximately 2,000 boe/d (50% oil). The acquisition has an
effective date of January 1, 2016 and is anticipated to close in late Q4 
2016.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">In 2016, the majority of activity will be 
associated
with permitting and pre-drill activities for Burgmoor Z5 and two farm-in 
prospects, which are planned for 2017. In addition, we
will continue our ongoing analysis of the proprietary geologic data associated 
with the farm-in assets. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Sales</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">The price of our natural gas in Germany is 
based
on the TTF month-ahead index. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Sales per boe decreased versus all comparable
periods, consistent with a decrease in the TTF reference 
price.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
</div>

align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Royalties</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Our
                                         production in Germany is subject to 
state and private royalties on sales after certain
                                         eligible deductions. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Royalties
                                         as a percentage of sales was 15.4% and 
13.1% for the three and six months ended June
                                         30, 2016, a decrease from the 21.1% and
17.4% for the comparable periods in 2015. The
                                         decrease is due to unfavourable prior 
year adjustments impacting 2015.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:

Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-

                                         expense in Germany relates to costs 
incurred to deliver natural gas from the processing
                                         facility to the customer. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New

                                         2016 transportation expense increased 
from Q1 2016 on a total dollar and per unit basis
                                         due to an adjustment recorded in the 
current quarter relating to 2015.<I> </I></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New

                                         expense decreased by 15% and 9% for the

                                         to the same periods in 2015, primarily

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New

Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-

administration
expenses were consistent with Q1 2016. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align:

<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">General and administration
costs for the three and six months ended June 30, 2016 are higher compared to 
2015 due to higher staffing levels and office costs
incurred to support our farm-in agreement, as well as costs incurred to support 
asset acquisition activity.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 11pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-

Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">We expect per unit general
and administration costs to improve as our production base in Germany 
grows.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Times New

Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-
serif">Current income taxes in Germany are applied to taxable income, after 
eligible
deductions, at a statutory tax rate of approximately 24.2%. As a function of 
Vermilion&rsquo;s tax basis in Germany, Vermilion
does not presently pay income taxes in Germany. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>IRELAND BUSINESS UNIT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Overview</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">18.5% non-operating interest in the offshore
Corrib gas field located approximately 83 km off the northwest coast of 
Ireland.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Project comprises six offshore wells, offshore
and onshore sales and transportation pipeline segments as well as a natural gas 
processing facility. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Corrib is expected to produce approximately
58 mmcf/d (9,700 boe/d) net to Vermilion at peak production rates. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-
align: justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Natural gas began to flow from our Corrib gas
project on December 30, 2015 and to date, well performance and facility runtimes
have exceeded expectations.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production averaged 47 mmcf/d (7,877 boe/d)
net to Vermilion during Q2 2016, an increase of 39% versus the prior quarter. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Following the completion of previously planned
recertification activities associated with the third party gas distribution 
pipeline network during the quarter, production volumes
at Corrib reached full plant capacity of approximately 65 mmcf/d (10,900 boe/d),
net to Vermilion at the end of Q2 2016. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Activity review</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">As part of the recertification process, 
confirmatory
inspection digs on the export sales pipeline were completed during Q2 2016, as 
well as some subsea inspections, maintenance and
repairs on the subsea systems.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Five of the six wells are currently on 
production,
with the remaining well to be brought online in Q3 2016 following the conclusion
of our offshore work program to lay a pipeline
to the sixth well.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>

</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt

family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Transportation
expense for the three and six months ended June 30, 2016 is 4% lower versus the 
comparable periods in 2015, despite unfavourable
foreign exchange impacts, due to a decrease in the ship or pay obligation.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Operating</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Operating expense increased on a dollar basis
from Q1 2016 by 43% primarily due to the 39% increase in 
production.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>General and administration</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Calibri,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">General and administrative expense for the 
three
and six months ended June 30, 2016 is higher versus the comparable periods in 
2015 due to increased corporate allocations as a
result of achieving our first two full quarters of production.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P></DIV>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>AUSTRALIA BUSINESS UNIT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Overview</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Entered Australia in 2005. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family:
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Hold a 100% operated working interest in the
Wandoo field, located approximately 80 km offshore on the northwest shelf of 
Australia.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production is operated from two off-shore 
platforms,
and originates from 18 well bores and five lateral sidetrack 
wells.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Wells that utilize horizontal legs (ranging
in length from 500 to 3,000 plus metres) are located 600 metres below the seabed
in approximately 55 metres of water depth. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; text-
align: justify">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Production</B></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align:

<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Q2 2016 production decreased 2% quarter-over-
quarter
and increased 4% year-over-year.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align:

Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">Production volumes are managed within corporate
targets while meeting customer demands and the requirements of long-term supply 
agreements.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New 
Roman,serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: 
top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-
serif">We continue to plan for long-term production levels of between 6,000 and
8,000 bbls/d. </FONT><BR>
<BR>
</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt Times New

2016.

placed on production in late July 2016.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right;
