<TD STYLE="width: 0"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 9pt"><SUP>(1)</SUP></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify">The senior unsecured notes, which had a principal 
balance of $225.0 million and matured and were
repaid on February 10, 2016, were included in the current portion of long-term 
debt as at December 31, 2015.</TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>Revolving Credit Facility </B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">At June 30, 2016, Vermilion had in place a bank
revolving credit facility totalling $2 billion, of which approximately $1.35 
billion was drawn. The facility, which matures on
May 31, 2019, is fully revolving up to the date of maturity.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The facility is extendable from time to time,
but not more than once per year, for a period not longer than four years, at the
option of the lenders and upon notice from Vermilion.
If no extension is granted by the lenders, the amounts owing pursuant to the 
facility are due at the maturity date. This facility
bears interest at a rate applicable to demand loans plus applicable margins. For
the six months ended June 30, 2016, the interest
rate on the revolving credit facility was approximately 3.4% (2015 &ndash; 
3.1%).</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The amount available to Vermilion under this
facility is reduced by certain outstanding letters of credit associated with 
Vermilion&rsquo;s operations totalling $24.0 million
as at June 30, 2016 (December 31, 2015 - $25.2 million).</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The facility is secured by various fixed and
floating charges against the subsidiaries of Vermilion. As at June 30, 2016, 
Vermilion was in compliance with all financial covenants.
These financial covenants required Vermilion to maintain:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">A ratio of total debt (defined as 
amounts classified
as &ldquo;Long-term debt&rdquo;, &ldquo;Current portion of long term 
debt&rdquo;, and &ldquo;Finance lease obligation&rdquo; on
the balance sheet), to consolidated net earnings before interest, income taxes, 
depreciation, accretion and other certain non-cash
items (defined as consolidated EBITDA) of not greater than 4.0. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="font: 10pt 
Arial,sans-serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top">
<TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Symbol">&middot;</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif">A ratio of consolidated total 
senior debt (defined
as consolidated total debt excluding unsecured and subordinated debt) to total 
capitalization (defined as amounts classified as
&ldquo;Shareholders&rsquo; equity&rdquo; on the balance sheet plus consolidated 
total senior debt as defined above) of not greater
than 55%.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>6. DEFERRED INCOME TAXES</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">For the six months ended June 30, 2016, Vermilion
de-recognized $34.1 million (year ended December 31, 2015 - $51.7 million) of 
deferred tax assets, relating to certain non-capital
losses for which there is uncertainty as to the Company&rsquo;s ability to fully
utilize such losses when applying forecasted commodity
prices in effect as at June 30, 2016.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-indent: 
0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

justify">Dividends declared to shareholders for the six
months ended June 30, 2016 were $147.5 million (2015 - $140.4 million).</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Subsequent to the end of the period and prior
to the condensed consolidated interim financial statements being authorized for 
issue, Vermilion declared dividends totalling $25.1
million or $0.215 per share.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>8. EQUITY BASED COMPENSATION </B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.25in; text-
align: justify"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The following table summarizes the number of
awards outstanding under the Vermilion Incentive Plan (&ldquo;VIP&rdquo;):</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; 
text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse; font-size: 11pt">
<tr style="vertical-align: bottom; background-color: #D9D9D9">
    <td style="width: 86%; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: 
justify"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></td>
    <td style="width: 14%; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: 
right"><FONT STYLE="font-size: 5pt">&nbsp;</FONT></td></tr>

    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-

    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 0.35pt; padding-

    <td style="padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family:

<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second 
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B>9. SEGMENTED INFORMATION</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Vermilion&rsquo;s operating activities in each
business unit relate solely to the exploration, development and production of 
petroleum and natural gas. Vermilion has a Corporate
head office located in Calgary, Alberta. Costs incurred in the Corporate segment
relate to Vermilion&rsquo;s global hedging program
and expenses incurred in financing and managing the Company&rsquo;s operating 
business units.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The following table shows the fund flows from
operations generated by each of Vermilion&rsquo;s business units. Fund flows 
from operations is a measure of profit or loss regularly
provided to Vermilion&rsquo;s chief operating decision maker. Fund flows from 
operations provides a measure of each business unit&rsquo;s
profitability and, correspondingly, its ability to pay dividends, fund asset
retirement obligations, and make capital investments.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; 
text-indent: 0.25in">&nbsp;</P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse; font-size: 11pt">

    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">2.7 </font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; 
text-align: right">&nbsp;</td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; background-color: #D9D9D9; 
padding-right: 4.1pt; padding-left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; 
text-align: right"><font style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size:
10pt"><b>3.2 </b></font></td>
    <td style="border-bottom: black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3.35pt; padding-
left: 0.35pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right"><font 
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt">2.8 
</font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The ratio of net debt to annualized fund flows
from operations increased to 3.2 times for the six months ended June 30, 2016 
primarily as a result of declines in commodity prices,
which decreased annualized fund flows from operations.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Times New Roman,serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify; 
text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>11. FINANCIAL 
INSTRUMENTS</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><B><U>Determination of Fair Values</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">The level in the fair value hierarchy into which
the fair value measurements are categorized is determined on the basis of the 
lowest level input that is significant to the fair
value measurement. Transfers between levels on the fair value hierarchy are 
deemed to have occurred at the end of the reporting
period.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Level 1 &ndash; Fair value measurement is determined
by reference to unadjusted quoted prices in active markets for identical assets 
or liabilities.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Level 2 &ndash; Fair value measurement is determined
based on inputs other than unadjusted quoted prices that are observable, either 
directly or indirectly.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Level 3 &ndash; Fair value measurement is based
on inputs for the asset or liability that are not based on observable market 
data.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Cash and cash equivalents are classified as Level
1 measurements. Cash and cash equivalents, receivables, and payables approximate
their value due to the short-term nature of those
instruments. The fair value of long-term debt on the revolving credit facility 
approximates carrying value due to the use of short-term
borrowing instruments at market rates of interest.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Derivative assets and derivative liabilities
are classified as Level 2 measurements. The fair value for derivative assets and
derivative liabilities are determined using pricing
models incorporating future prices that are based on assumptions which are 
supported by prices from observable market transactions
and are adjusted for credit risk.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Vermilion does not have any financial instruments
classified as Level 3 measurements.</P></DIV>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 55; Value: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><P STYLE="margin-top: 0pt; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 0pt; font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: 
PageNo -->54<!-- Field: /Sequence --></P></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><P STYLE="margin: 0pt">&nbsp;</P></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<DIV STYLE="border: Black 1pt solid; padding-right: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt; 
padding-left: 3pt; width: 99%">
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse: 
collapse">
<tr style="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; background-color: 
rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font style="font-
family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</i></b></font></td>
    <TD STYLE="width: 50%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; text-align: right; 
background-color: rgb(222,222,222); padding-top: 3pt; padding-bottom: 3pt"><font
style="font-family: Arial Narrow,sans-serif; font-size: 9pt"><b><i>2016 Second 
Quarter Report</i></b></font></td></tr>
</table>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0"><B><U>Nature and 
Extent of Risks Arising from Financial Instruments</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Arial,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify"><I>Market risk:</I></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify">Vermilion&rsquo;s financial instruments are exposed
to currency risk related to changes in foreign currency denominated financial 
instruments and commodity price risk related to outstanding
derivatives. The following table summarizes the impact on comprehensive income 
before tax for the six months ended June 30, 2016
given changes in the relevant risk variables that Vermilion considers reasonably
possible at the balance sheet date. The impact
on comprehensive income before tax associated with changes in these risk 
variables for assets and liabilities that are not considered
financial instruments are excluded from this analysis. This analysis does not 
attempt to reflect any interdependencies between
the relevant risk variables.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: justify;
text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width: 100%; border-collapse:

        <P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify"><SUP>2</SUP> Lead Director</P>
<P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify"><SUP>3</SUP> Audit Committee</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify"><SUP>4</SUP> Governance and Human
        Resources         Committee</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify"><SUP>5</SUP> Health, Safety and
        Environment         Committee</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify"><SUP>6</SUP> Independent Reserves
        Committee</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 8.5pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0">&nbsp;</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 9pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 
0"><B>ABBREVIATIONS</B></P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">$M&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tho
usand
        dollars</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">$MM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;million
        dollars</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">AECO&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; the daily average
        benchmark price for natural gas at the AECO</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp
;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lsquo;C&rsquo; hub in southeast
        Alberta</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">bbl(s)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        barrel(s)</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">bbls/d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        barrels per day</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">bcf&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&n
bsp;billion cubic feet</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">boe&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        barrel of oil equivalent, including: crude oil, condensate, natural gas 
liquids, and natural gas (converted on the basis of one
        boe for six mcf of natural gas)</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">boe/d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        barrel of oil equivalent per day</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">btu&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Br
itish thermal units</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">CGU&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        Cash generating unit, the basis upon which Vermilion&rsquo;s assets are 
evaluated for potential impairments</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">DRIP&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        Dividend Reinvestment Plan</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">GJ&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gigajoules</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt;
text-indent: 
-22.5pt">HH&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Henry
        Hub, a reference price paid for natural gas in US dollars at Erath, 
Louisiana</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mbbls&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        thousand barrels</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mboe&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        thousand barrel of oil equivalent</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mcf&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        thousand cubic feet</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mcf/d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        thousand cubic feet per day</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mmboe&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        million barrel of oil equivalent</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mmbtu&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        million British thermal units</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mmcf&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; million 
cubic feet</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">mmcf/d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        million cubic feet per day</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">MWh&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        megawatt hour</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">NBP&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        the reference price paid for natural gas in the United Kingdom, quoted 
in pence per therm, at the National Balancing Point Virtual
        Trading Point operated by National Grid. Our production in Ireland is 
priced with reference to NBP.</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">NGLs&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        natural gas liquids, which includes butane, propane, and ethane</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">PRRT&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        Petroleum Resource Rent Tax, a profit based tax levied on petroleum 
projects in Australia</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">TTF&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
        the day-ahead price for natural gas in the Netherlands, quoted in MWh of
natural gas, at the Title Transfer Facility Virtual Trading
        Point operated by Dutch TSO Gas Transport Services</P>
        <P STYLE="font: 6pt Arial Narrow,sans-serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 22.5pt; 
text-indent: -22.5pt">WTI&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
West Texas Intermediate, the reference price paid for crude oil of standard 
grade in US dollars at Cushing, Oklahoma</P></TD>

8431 TEL</P>

8100 FAX</P>

8101 IR TOLL FREE</P>

<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; text-align: 
right"><B>Exhibit 99.2</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: 
center; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>FORM
52-109F2</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: 
center; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>CERTIFICATION
OF INTERIM FILINGS - FULL CERTIFICATE</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">I,
Anthony Marino<I>, President &amp; Chief Executive Officer, of Vermilion Energy 
Inc.</I>, certify the following:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 33pt; text-
indent: -32.95pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-
size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; text-
align: justify">
<TD STYLE="width: 0in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; text-align: left"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt">1.</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family: 
Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>Review:
</I></B>I have reviewed the interim financial report and interim MD&amp;A 
(together, the &ldquo;interim filings&rdquo;) of Vermilion
Energy Inc. (the &ldquo;issuer&rdquo;) for the interim period ended June 30, 
2016.</FONT></TD>
</TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 33pt; text-
align: justify; text-indent: -32.95pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 
10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">2.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>No
                                         misrepresentations: </I></B>Based on my
knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence,
                                         the interim filings do not contain any 
untrue statement of a material fact or omit to
                                         state a material fact required to be 
stated or that is necessary to make a statement
                                         not misleading in light of the 
circumstances under which it was made, with respect to
                                         the period covered by the interim 
filings. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 33pt; text-
align: justify; text-indent: -32.95pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font: 
10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">3.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>Fair
                                         presentation: </I></B>Based on my 
knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence, the
                                         interim financial report together with 
the other financial information included in the
                                         interim filings fairly present in all 
material respects the financial condition, financial
                                         performance and cash flows of the 
issuer, as of the date of and for the periods presented
                                         in the interim filings. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 33pt; text-
align: justify; text-indent: -32.95pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0"><TR STYLE="vertical-align: top; font:

<TD STYLE="width: 0in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-

10pt"><B><I>Responsibility: </I></B>The
                                                                                
issuer&rsquo;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for            
establishing
                                                                                
and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (DC&amp;P) and internal      
control
                                                                                
over financial reporting (ICFR), as those terms are defined in National 
Instrument
                                                                                
52-109 <I>Certification of Disclosure in Issuers&rsquo; Annual and Interim 
Filings,
                                                                                
</I>for the issuer. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.1pt; 
text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; 
font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-

</I></B>Subject to the limitations, if any, described in paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3,
the issuer&rsquo;s other certifying officer(s)
and I have, as at the end of the period covered by the interim 
filings</FONT></TD>
</TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.1pt; 
text-align: center"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; 
font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-

Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">designed
DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed under our supervision, to provide 
reasonable assurance that</FONT></TD>
</TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in; 
text-indent: -0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; 
font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 7%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD STYLE="width: 93%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; padding-left: 0.25in;

issuer is made known to us by others, particularly during the period in which 
the interim filings are being prepared; and</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in;

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in;

<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="width: 100%">
<TR STYLE="vertical-align: top">
    <TD STYLE="width: 7%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD STYLE="width: 93%; font: 11pt Calibri,sans-serif; padding-left: 0.25in;

    required to be disclosed by the issuer in its annual filings, interim

    by it under securiti</FONT></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial,sans-

    processed, summarized and reported within the time periods specified in

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in;

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.75in;

                                         ICFR, or caused it to be designed under

                                         regarding the reliability of financial

                                         statements for external purposes in

10pt"><B><I>Reporting
                                         changes in ICFR: </I></B>The issuer has
disclosed in its interim MD&amp;A any change
                                         in the issuer&rsquo;s ICFR that

<TYPE>EX-99.3

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 99.3
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
     <TITLE></TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; text-align: 
right"><B>Exhibit 99.3</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: 
center; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>FORM
52-109F2 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: 
center; margin-bottom: 0pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B>CERTIFICATION
OF INTERIM FILINGS - FULL CERTIFICATE</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">I,
Curtis Hicks<I>, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, of 
Vermilion Energy Inc.</I>, certify the following:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 33pt; text-
indent: -32.95pt"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-
size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">1.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>Review:
                                         </I></B>I have reviewed the interim 
financial report and interim MD&amp;A (together,
                                         the &ldquo;interim filings&rdquo;) of 
Vermilion Energy Inc. (the &ldquo;issuer&rdquo;)
                                         for the interim period ended June 30, 
2016. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">2.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>No
                                         misrepresentations: </I></B>Based on my
knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence,
                                         the interim filings do not contain any 
untrue statement of a material fact or omit to
                                         state a material fact required to be 
stated or that is necessary to make a statement
                                         not misleading in light of the 
circumstances under which it was made, with respect to
the period covered by the interim 
filings. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">3.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><B><I>Fair
                                         presentation: </I></B>Based on my 
knowledge, having exercised reasonable diligence, the
                                         interim financial report together with 
the other financial information included in the
                                         interim filings fairly present in all 
material respects the financial condition, financial
                                         performance and cash flows of the 
issuer, as of the date of and for the periods presented
                                         in the interim filings. 
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">4.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt"><B><I>Responsibility:
                                         </I></B>The issuer&rsquo;s other 
certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing
                                         and maintaining disclosure controls and
procedures (DC&amp;P) and internal control over
                                         financial reporting (ICFR), as those 
terms are defined in National Instrument 52-109
                                         <I>Certification of Disclosure in 
Issuers&rsquo; Annual and Interim Filings, </I>for
                                         the issuer. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-
align: top; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">
<TD STYLE="width: 0; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">5.</FONT></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: normal 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-
Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt"><B><I>Design:
                                         </I></B>Subject to the limitations, if 
any, described in paragraphs 5.2 and 5.3, the
issuer&rsquo;s other certifying <FONT 
STYLE="font-weight: normal; font-style: normal">office</FONT></FONT><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">r(s)
                                         and I have, as at the end of the period
covered by the interim filings</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-

<TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.25in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt">(a)</FONT></TD><TD STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; 
font-size: 10pt">designed
                                         DC&amp;P, or caused it to be designed 
under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
                                         that</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-

<TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.25in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="text-align: justify; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;material                                       
information relating to the issuer is made known to us by others,
                                                                                
particularly during                                          the period in which
the interim filings are being prepared;
                                                                                
and</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: -0.25in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial,

<TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD 
STYLE="width: 0.25in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD

                                         &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">information
                                         required to be disclosed by the issuer 
in its annual filings, interim filings or other
                                         reports filed or sub<FONT STYLE="font-
weight: normal; font-style: normal">mitted by it
                                         un</FONT></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-
family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">der
                                         securities legislation is recorded, 
processed, summarized and reported within the time
                                         periods specified in securities 
legislation; and</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><TR STYLE="vertical-

<TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif"></TD><TD

Helvetica, Sans-Serif"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; 
font-size: 10pt">designed
                                         ICFR, or caused it to be designed under
our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
                                         regarding the reliability of financial 
reporting and the preparation of financial statements
                                         for external purposes in accordance 
with the issuer&rsquo;s GAAP.</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: -0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-

<TD STYLE="width: 0in"></TD><TD STYLE="width: 0.5in; text-align: left"><FONT 
STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size:

weight: normal"><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-

                                         framework: </I></B>The control 
framework the issuer&rsquo;s other certifying <FONT STYLE="font-weight: normal; 
font-style: normal">officer</FONT></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family: Arial, 
Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">(s)
                                         and I used to design the issuer&rsquo;s
ICFR is the Integrated Framework&#9;(2013 Framework)
                                         issued by the Committee of Sponsoring 
Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO).</FONT></TD>
</TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;

STYLE="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 
10pt"><B><I>Reporting
                                         changes in ICFR: </I></B>The issuer has
disclosed in its interim MD&amp;A any change
                                         in the issuer&rsquo;s ICFR that 
occurred during the period beginning on April 1, 2016
                                         and ended on June 30, 2016 that has 
materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially
                                         affect, the issuer&rsquo;s ICFR.
